title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: When a working set is removed, the changes are applied immediately.
EB: The changes should not be applied immediately when a working set is removed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set.
